PLDT Digicon

Fearlessly transforming event engagement

OVERVIEW

In October 2016, I joined ePLDT’s Experience Creation Team and PLDT’s Disruptive Business Group.

During the two years, I helped the team define its very own process and launched multiple experiments on the AARRR funnels of the company’s products and solutions. I helped ePLDT tackle tough challenges such as designing customer and employee experiences, bridging the gap between user experience and data security and establishing design strategies for cross-functional teams.

This experience helped me learn new design methodologies and strategy frameworks which refined my overall comprehension of user experience and product design for the digital medium.

Role

Design, Strategy, UX Research

Company

ePLDT

Period

Oct 2016 Jul 2018

Industry

Enterprise, ICT, B2B

Design is a battle-tested
strategy for innovation.

Following the footsteps of giants such as Google Ventures, Slack and IBM, we found that embracing design at an early stage takes far fewer resources. Data tells us that a competitive edge can be built through design.

Understanding

Campus events don't get enough social media presence, because content is spread out over so many different platforms. I conducted a questionnaire and found that event awareness is limited. With that in mind, these are our goals—

Understanding, Challenge

Campus events don't get enough social media presence, because content is spread out over so many different platforms. I conducted a questionnaire and found that event awareness is limited. With that in mind, these are our goals—

Drive participant engagement 
and improve registration

Approach

Campus events don't get enough social media presence, because content is spread out over so many different platforms. I conducted a questionnaire and found that event awareness is limited. With that in mind, these are our goals—

Competitor analysis and research

A deep dive into uncovering the lay of the land and understanding the market, the industry and its users.

Who is this all for? Who are the real users here?

Creating personas based on mass surveys, user interviews, talking to everyone I can get my hands on and first-hand experience by becoming a student myself.

Wearing the creative cape in a full-stack world

Leveraging atomic design principles with Bootstrap’s capabilities to create scalable and efficient front-end modules.

Solution

Campus events don't get enough social media presence, because content is spread out over so many different platforms. I conducted a questionnaire and found that event awareness is limited. With that in mind, these are our goals—

Competitor analysis and research

A deep dive into uncovering the lay of the land and understanding the market, the industry and its users.

Who is this all for? Who are the real users here?

Creating personas based on mass surveys, user interviews, talking to everyone I can get my hands on and first-hand experience by becoming a student myself.

Wearing the creative cape in a full-stack world

Leveraging atomic design principles with Bootstrap’s capabilities to create scalable and efficient front-end modules.
